You are hungry! Let's cook a delicious meal. Check the cookbook in the kitchen for the recipe. Once done, enjoy your meal!

-= Kitchen =-
You are in a kitchen. A normal one. You start to take note of what's in the room.

You see a fridge. The fridge contains a cilantro. A closed oven is close by. You can see a table. On the table you can make out a cookbook. Hmmm... what else, what else? You bend down to tie your shoe. When you stand up, you notice a counter. But the thing hasn't got anything on it. You see a gleam over in a corner, where you can see a stove. The stove is conventional. But the thing is empty. Hm. Oh well

You are hungry! Let's cook a delicious meal. Check the cookbook in the kitchen for the recipe. Once done, enjoy your meal!

-= Kitchen =-
You are in a kitchen. A normal one. You start to take note of what's in the room.

You see a fridge. The fridge contains a cilantro. A closed oven is close by. You can see a table. On the table you can make out a cookbook. Hmmm... what else, what else? You bend down to tie your shoe. When you stand up, you notice a counter. But the thing hasn't got anything on it. You see a gleam over in a corner, where you can see a stove. The stove is conventional. But the thing is empty. Hm. Oh well
